cmput301.f13t01.editstory

Class ChoiceListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Choice>
        • cmput301.f13t01.editstory.ChoiceListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class ChoiceListAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Choice>
    The ChoiceListAdapter class is the ArrayAdapter for the ChoiceList Fragment. It handles inflating the list's views by extracting the StoryFragment titles from the EditManager based on the StoryFragmentIds contained in the passed Choice. Activities using this fragment must implement the ChoiceListListener interface.
    Version:
    1.0, 30/10/13
    Author:
    Jesse Huard
